caption: A must add to your restaurant list! The weather is finally nice and the patio atmosphere is superb. Service is 5 🌟 as is the food and drink. Rigatoni, seafood fettuccine and gnocchi all scrumptious.

The atmosphere was great and the staff was helpful.  The octopus appetizers were over salted. It honestly gave me a slight headache. The rockfish dinner was delicious, but the quantity of food was the definition of slim and for the price of the plate and I think that's unfortunate. They need to add something more filling to the plate and not raise the price. I was hungry immediately after I left. I ordered wings (yeah) at Wonderland. The desserts looked good beware those were pricey too, we passed though, we were in a rush (wonderland can get packed and we wanted to avoid the wait). And the steak (again delicious) was $29 with no sides, so he also left hungry. I see this location as a for special occasions only. To be fair I should add the pasta dishes maybe more filling than the meat plate (including fish) options. One of the people at the table said the chicken dish was filling.
Lobster risotto was amazing,  super friendly and amazing

We hoped to try the veal ossobuco but they were sold out. Instead we ordered the sauteed scallops, papardelle, and linguine for takeout and everything was absolutely delicious! What a great neighborhood gem and welcome addition to the 11th St food corridor.
Fabolous. Our server, Louis was compassionate and just a class act all around. My wife and I really enjoyed our late Valentine's Day dinner.
Such a great restaurant.  I have been several times, the food and service are always top notch. I encourage everyone to check it out.  The octopus appetizer is AMAZING!
Incredible back patio and excellent food with even better service. Glad to have a great new local spot

I love this restaurant!! It is very authentic and the entire experience is exquisite. You won't be disappointed. The food is delicious and the service is excellent. Try to make sure you leave room for appetizers, and dessert. They are just as good as the entrees!!  You won't regret it.
We wanted calamari,  searched the neighborhood for it and was so happy! The white sauce was delicious! The porkchop and potatoes in port sauce was sooo good, I can’t wait to eat it again!
Great patio out back and very friendly service. The food great, and the fixed price menu is a great deal!
Lovely and safe dining on the back patio. Cozy digs, heated outdoor seating, amazing service from Luis. Look forward to a return visit.

Delighted by this delicious italian restaurant! The calamari was an airy pleasure to eat, melting in the mouth. Good service, well balanced cocktail, a nice red, and very tasty main course make this a worthwhile spot to try for yourself!

We had a fantastic experience at Ossobuco!  Got there a bit early on a Thursday night and decided to eat on their back patio.  It wasn't exactly a warm evening, but with our coats on and the heat lamps it was very comfortable.  We felt Covid safe, with only one other table occupied.  GF got the namesake dish, while I ordered the lobster risotto.  The wine list is pretty small, but we found something nice.  Both dishes were delicious.  GF's veal was super tender, and my risotto was loaded with lobster meat.  I crushed it!  I will definitely go back.
